Package com.guflimc.brick.scheduler.api

Interface Scheduler

All Known Implementing Classes:
BrickThreadPoolScheduler, MinestomScheduler, SpigotScheduler
public interface Scheduler
The scheduler can submit repeating and delayed tasks on the main thread of the application or on a separate thread.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Executor
    async()
    Gets the executor that executes tasks on a separate thread.
    SchedulerTask
    asyncLater(@NotNull Runnable task, long delay, @NotNull TimeUnit unit)
    Schedules a task with a delayed execution on a separate thread.
    SchedulerTask
    asyncRepeating(@NotNull Runnable task, long delay, long interval, @NotNull TimeUnit unit)
    Schedules a task to be repeatedly executed on a separate thread.
    SchedulerTask
    asyncRepeating(@NotNull Runnable task, long interval, @NotNull TimeUnit unit)
    Schedules a task to be repeatedly executed on a separate thread.
    default CompletableFuture<Void>
    runAsync(@NotNull Runnable runnable)
    Executes the given Runnable on a separate thread and returns a CompletableFuture that is completed when the execution is finished.
    default <T> CompletableFuture<T>
    supplyAsync(@NotNull Supplier<T> supplier)
    Supplies a value with a Supplier on a separate thread and returns a CompletableFuture that will be completed with the value.

    • asyncRepeating

      SchedulerTask asyncRepeating(@NotNull @NotNull Runnable task, long interval, @NotNull @NotNull TimeUnit unit)
      Schedules a task to be repeatedly executed on a separate thread. The first execution is submitted with no delay.
      Parameters:
      task - the task
      interval - the interval
      unit - the time unit
      Returns:
      the scheduled task
